overview:
Nadeem Kassam is an entrepreneur with over 15 years experience in growing businesses from the ground up. Nadeem is Director at Zynik Capital Corp., a private equity firm which has completed transactions that now represent over $3 billion in assets under management, as well as founder and Chief Alliance Officer at BASIS Science, a company that aims to change the way people think about their personal health and wellbeing.

In 2001, Nadeem co-founded BlabberForce Enterprises, a collegiate marketing, product sampling, and promotions company focused in Boston and other major college communities and spring break destinations. Nadeem simultaneously founded ClubVibes.com, a global nightlife community and portal.

Also acting as an angel investor, Nadeem co-founded Social Fluency in 2007, a company that specifically speaks to his passion for improving the social experience for individuals. In a similar vein, Nadeem has partnered to bring the Future of Health Now 2012, an online event specifically focused on bringing 20 of the world’s best medical and wellness professionals together to provide individuals with free advice. Nadeem also sits on the board for Etuvé Foods, a culinary company focusing on providing chefs and food service operators with outstanding sous-vide products as well as industry related consulting.

Nadeem pursued a four-year degree at Babson College, earning his B.A. in Entrepreneurship in 2003. You can follow Nadeem on Twitter as @NadeemZynik.
